name: gridmap-layout-usa
description: Positions of tiles for USA grid map visualization
author: Krist Wongsuphasawat <krist.wongz@gmail.com> (http://kristw.yellowpigz.com)

scripts.compile: node src/compile.js && node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs --compress --mangle -- src/output/gridmap-layout-usa.js > src/output/gridmap-layout-usa.min.js && cp src/output/gridmap-layout*.* dist
